name: No Emotions
description:
Cute little platformer with amazing graphics.

You play as a little vulnerable thing what needs to share it's feelings with others.

There are your friends and evil people.Friends always help you if you open up. Do not open up to anybody except your friends.Evil people are trying to hurt you, so you gotta pack your emotions and feelings. Beware of evil people.

Press E or Mouse left button to open up or pack your emotions.

Black form indicates what your emotions are packes, white what they are not.
